description: This file defines a React Native component called SearchScreen, which provides a user interface for searching recipes by name, category, or ingredients. It manages search input, displays search results in a grid, and handles navigation to recipe details.

methods.name: SearchScreen
methods.description: Main functional component for the search screen, managing state, UI, and interactions.

methods.name: handleSearch
methods.description: Handles search input changes, fetches matching recipes, and updates the displayed data.

methods.name: onPressRecipe
methods.description: Handles navigation to the recipe detail screen when a recipe is selected.

methods.name: renderRecipes
methods.description: Renders individual recipe items in the list.
